features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Synchronize watch progress across multiple media servers including Plex, Jellyfin, and Emby

features.title: Multi
features.description: Connect and sync watch states between different media server instances seamlessly

features.title: Episode Tracking
features.description: Automatically track which episodes you've watched and resume from where you left off

features.title: Conflict Resolution
features.description: Handle watch state conflicts intelligently when the same content is watched on different servers

features.title: Manual Adjustments
features.description: Override automatic tracking with manual episode marking for complete control

features.title: Metadata Matching
features.description: Accurately match content across servers using TMDB, TVDB, or IMDB identifiers

features.title: Scheduled Sync
features.description: Configure automatic synchronization intervals to keep watch states current without manual intervention

features.title: Webhook Support
features.description: Trigger syncs automatically when content is played using webhooks from media servers
